sources.title: 2004 - Arizona Summer - A Camp Adventure They Will Never Forget
sources.description:
Brent and Brooke Butler hit Camp Travers where the younger yo-yo master outsmarts cabin bullies with slick tricks while big bro clashes with rival counselor Mike for top-dog status.
These siblings flip summer chaos into wins, proving quick wits and bold moves rule the Arizona heat.

Director: Joey Travolta
Writers: Bill Blair

Main cast:
Gemini Barnett - Brent
Brent Blair - Jack
Christy Blair - Head Counselor
Brooke Burgstahler - Christy
Scott Clifton - Brooke
Greg Evigan - Rick
Morgan Fairchild - Debbie
Bug Hall - Scott
David Henrie - Bad
Lorenzo James Henrie - Jerry
Hoku - Shawn
Michelle Holgate - Donna
Scott Johnson - Matt
Jessica Kinsella - Sabrina
April Lunsford - Melissa
Lee Majors - Mr. Travers
Michael Margetis - Mumps

Genres: Adventure, Family, Comedy

metadata.Plot: A family-oriented story revolving around Brent Butler (Gemini Barnett), a wiser-than-his years youngster and modern-day Tom Sawyer. The majority of the story takes place at a boys' and girls' camp owned and operated by Travers (Lee Majors), who has spent a lifetime of quietly helping adolescents become confident young adults. In addition to the full gamut of camp activities, adventures, practical jokes, and conflict resolution there is the underling theme that bolsters the importance of a positive father-son relationship.
metadata.Actors: Gemini Barnett, Brent Blair, Christy Blair
